body.p:
Louisa Lawrence co Ky
23 Dec 65.
To His Excellency
Ths E Bramlett
Gov Kentucky
Sir --

your Petitioners citizens of Lawrence Co ky humbly Petition your Excellency to remit a Fine of $60 rendered before J. M Clayton Co Judge of for Lawrence Co Ky on the day of Dec 1865 against Samuel G Layne on a charge of Keeping a Tippling House Layne is a young man of Good character & this is his first offense He plead guilty to the charge & has quit having any-thing to do with Ardent spirits We think he will not offend again and respectfully ask your clemency in his behalf as in duty Bound we we pray

Samuel. G. Layne
